Reviews.Title: exactly what i was looking for.
Reviews.Author: jen

Reviews.Title: Works very well for the price
Reviews.Author: dorothy cornwell

ProductInfo.Features:
3.5-Inch Monitor with 2 Outdoor Cameras
View live video from your Uniden wireless security camera system with the included portable, rechargeable 3.5-inch color screen monitor
Record video directly to the hard drive of your computer by attaching your monitor to the PC using the included USB cable
Uses Plug N Play technology for quick and easy set-up
Monitor allows you to view video in full screen, scan through cameras or view all cameras at the same time in Quad view
ProductInfo.Name: Uniden UDW155 Wireless Security Surveillance System
